content: Engaging a social media influencer, or Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs) as they are referred to in China, is one of the most effective ways to give your brand exposure.</br></br>APP Marketing works with dozens of successful influencers in North America and China to increase your brand’s credibility with consumers.</br></br>Consumers are more receptive to KOL marketing as they feel a closer connection to people as opposed corporate brands. Influencer can bring valuable exposure to brands by promoting their products to large follower bases.
